Actions.Text: REFERRED TO ALCOHOLISM AND DRUG ABUSE

Title: Creates a certified recovery residences task force
Summary: Creates a certified recovery residences task force to establish best practice guidelines for certified recovery living residences that illustrate the most appropriate and effective environment for persons recovering from a chemical dependency.
LawCode: Amd ยง32.05-a, Ment Hyg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to the creation of a certified recovery residences task force
